CustomField.description: A text box to write the condition of rule violation. Displays the message when the rule is triggered. For ex. ‘Standard profile to have no access of customer’s PII fields’.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A text box to write the condition of rule violation. Displays the message when the rule is triggered. For ex. ‘Standard profile to have no access of customer’s PII fields’.
CustomField.label: Error Message
